lexUnit.name: jug.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: volume contained by a large container for liquids, with a narrow mouth

sentence.text: ` No , much better recruit your energies , " said Anthony , just as David returned carrying a jug of hot water and two slices of lemon on a plate .
